question: Eklavya Model Residential Schools are run by which ministry?
option3: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
explanation: Eklavya Model Residential Schools are run in the areas where there is more than 50% Scheduled Tribes population in each block. Eklavya Model Residential Schools started functioning from the period 1997-98. Eklavya Model Residential Schools are maintained by Ministry of Tribal Affairs.
